title: List of all Android image gallery  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android image gallery  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-Image-Cropper
repoList.description: Image Cropping Library for Android, optimized for Camera / Gallery.

repoList.name: subsampling-scale-image-view
repoList.description: Android library (AAR). Highly configurable, easily extendable deep zoom view for displaying huge images without loss of detail. Perfect for photo galleries, maps, building plans etc.

repoList.name: ByakuGallery
repoList.description: An open source Android library that allows the visualization of large images with gesture capabilities

repoList.name: ImagePicker
repoList.description: Android library to easily pick an image from gallery or camera app. The users can select their prefered gallery/camera app on a unique Intent. Initial gist:

repoList.name: Louvre
repoList.description: A small customizable library useful to handle an gallery image pick action built-in your app. :sunrise_over_mountains::stars:

repoList.name: recent-images
repoList.description: Do you noticed the new feature of Telegram or Instagram?! They show your latest images when you try to attach or post a picture. So I developed this library the same with lots of customization. Simple way to get all images of device based on date taken, name, id and other customization

repoList.name: multiple-media-picker
repoList.description: An android library to pick multiple images and/or videos from built-in gallery. :camera: :gem: :boom:

repoList.name: ImagePicker
repoList.description: Android library to choose image from gallery or camera with option to compress result image

repoList.name: SaveImage
repoList.description: Cordova plugin allowing you to save an image file to the iOS Camera Roll / Photo Library or Android Gallery

repoList.name: PictureChooseLib
repoList.description: This is a picture select Android library that supports camera to take pictures, picture gallery multiple choice, image shearing！
